de.gsi.sd.BBQ_Proto1.data.provider

Class JAPCSettingsProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gsi.sd.BBQ_Proto1.data.provider.JAPCSettingsProvider

  • public class JAPCSettingsProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    This class connects to the FESA device and sets or gets the values of the Setting property. Because all access is done synchronously, all methods are realized as static methods. A more refined GUI may also subscribe to the Setting property to be automatically notified when another client changes the settings.
